name: Spin Time
description:
Learn what it truly means to spin in this indie clicker game by Dumb Video Game Stuff. Spin Time is a short relaxed comedic experience where all you do is press a button. Your mission? To help the world's greatest spinner, Horst, in his quest to achieve maximum spin.
Features:
- 5 unique modes
- Voice lines from "Voice of Czath"
- Two live-action cutscenes
